cast.name: 杜安德拉·T.布朗 Deuandra T. Brown

writer.name: 杜安德拉·T.布朗 Deuandra T. Brown

director.name: 杜安德拉·T.布朗 Deuandra T. Brown

introduction: Base on various stories when a killer seeks revenge by blaming people for the pain. Detective January and Detective Thomas investigated the murders while on a search for Tenley and Tina Hopkins. But Tenley and her fiancé Jerome faced a rough night; after leaving Shy's New Years Eve party. As for Tyanne who is looking for someone. Troy happen to get caught up in the killer's trap. Detective January has a twin brother named Jacob who met up with April for a fun thrilled night. But what will happen when the killer decides to take on a new victim?
